normalised: energy and utilities: solar rooftop subsidies

unnormalised: Good news, folks! Thinking of going solar on your chhat (roof)? The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is still offering some sweet subsidies for rooftop solar installations! Think "Suraj Hua Maddham" from Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham, but with the sun powering your whole house, not just looking pretty!
normalised: good news, folks! thinking of going solar on your chhat (roof)? the ministry of new and renewable energy is still offering some sweet subsidies for rooftop solar installations! think "suraj hua maddham" from kabhi khushi kabhie gham, but with the sun powering your whole house, not just looking pretty!

unnormalised: Apparently, folks in Gujarat and Rajasthan are really leading the charge, snapping up these deals. The subsidy scheme, routed through institutions like the Indian Renewable Energy Development Agency (IREDA), can significantly cut your initial investment. We're talking potentially shaving off thousands of Rupees!
normalised: apparently, folks in gujarat and rajasthan are really leading the charge, snapping up these deals. the subsidy scheme, routed through institutions like the indian renewable energy development agency (I R E D A), can significantly cut your initial investment. we're talking potentially shaving off thousands of rupees!

unnormalised: For smaller installations (up to 3 kW), the subsidy can cover a good chunk. Anything above that, and the subsidy tapers off, but hey, every little bit helps, right? Plus, you get to brag to Sharmaji next door about your eco-friendly setup.
normalised: for smaller installations (up to three kilowatt), the subsidy can cover a good chunk. anything above that, and the subsidy tapers off, but hey, every little bit helps, right? plus, you get to brag to sharmaji next door about your eco-friendly setup.

unnormalised: Check your state's power distribution company (DISCOM) website for specific details and application procedures. Don't wait too long, though – these subsidies are like mithai at Diwali, they don't last forever! Get that solar panel installed and say goodbye to hefty electricity bills! Happy saving!
normalised: check your state's power distribution company (D I S C O M) website for specific details and application procedures. don't wait too long, though – these subsidies are like mithai at diwali, they don't last forever! get that solar panel installed and say goodbye to hefty electricity bills! happy saving!
